articles.author: Fiona Jackson
articles.title: The clearest ever image of Saturn has been captured - Daily Mail
articles.description: An astrophotographer captured his clearest ever photo of Saturn from Los Angeles, USA on Sunday. The gas giant also reached its closest point to Earth this year, and was therefore at its brightest.
articles.content:
An astrophotographer has taken his clearest ever picture of Saturn while it made its closest approach to Earth this year.
Our planet moved almost directly between Saturn and the sun on Sunday, in an… [+7396 chars]
